channel.title: tag1 on Learning Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in tag1 on Learning Hugo

item.title: Taxonomies
item.description: Taxonomies This page has tags and categories. Most Hugo themes ship with this. You can also create your own. Moods is a custom taxonomy. It was custom made in the hugo.toml file. The format is singular = “plural”. EX: mood = “moods”.

item.title: C
item.description: Tags and Cats This is tagged in tag1, and in category cat1 This shows as related to the post Taxonomies for this theme
